description:
Now playing through January 8! Our conservatory exhibit Avant Garden explores the role of plants as the source of raw materials for textiles and the inspiration for fashion’s designs, colors, and shapes.The stars of the show are seven fantasy outfits crafted from plant materials such as succulents, Spanish moss, ferns, and poinsettias, creating topiary couture that ignites the imagination. (Pictured here.) Permission to try this at home! FREE.

Avant Garden runs through January 8, 2017. Open New Year's Day 1- am-4:30 pm. Closed Christmas Eve, Christmas, and New Year's Eve.

Visit the exhibit web page for more info and activity calendar: http://www.lsa.umich.edu/mbg/happening/avant-garden.asp
name: Exhibit: Avant Garden-Fashion & Plants Together!

description:
25th Anniversary Celebration: Hosted by Elaine and Harry Sargous and members of the CMSa2 Board of Directors.

Live music by CMSa2 students
Light refreshments
Lively conversation
Fundraising opportunities
name: CMSa2 Benefit Event: Resonating Through Time

description: Join our friends from New Belgium Brewing to try their new Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ale! They'll be pairing it with Ben and Jerry's ice creams to get the full effect- beer float, anyone?
name: Adult Ice Cream Social

description: This week, all our body care is 25% off! Skin care, hair care, cosmetics, soaps- it's all on sale, just in time for your holiday shopping. And with prices like this, you can pick up a few things to treat yo' self, too <3
name: 25% Off Body Care

description: This holiday season, every time you buy one of our Lucky's Market products, 10% of the profits go to Community Action Network (CAN) of Ann Arbor to provide food for families who need some extra help. Look for the red L throughout the store to get products that are a great value, taste great, have no artifical colors, preservatives, or flavors, and give back to the community at the same time. This program runs from November 9th through December 14th, so mark your calendars and thank you for helping us make Ann Arbor a great place for everyone!
name: 10% For Good for Community Action Network

description:
A full sensory experience with 8 wines, cheese, and charcuterie! We will discuss the history, tasting notes, and body of the wines. 

We are featuring Sparkling Wines for this tasting, perfect for the holidays!
name: Sava's Uncorked: Sparkling Wines

description:
Open to the Public. FREE
The workshop will be a panel of area young adults who have transitioned genders.  They will have a discussion regarding transgender issues and schools, as well as the transition to adulthood.  There will be a question and answer time as well.
name: Parent Workshop: Transgender Young Adult Panel

description:
Join us for this self-proclaimed "geek show-and-tell." Makers present their creations! 

We have people interested in a wide scope of topics and endeavors. Programming, robots, machining, welding, artistic creations, metal casting, anything being built or created. Pretty much anything someone is "Making" is welcome at a Go-Tech meeting. 

Also, if you have a problem with your project ask for help and the brain trust of Go-Tech will amaze you with solutions to difficulties you haven't even explored yet.. This is an open group all are welcome and especially young makers are encouraged to bring in a project to show off.

Second Tuesday of each month at 7pm.
name: Go-Tech Meeting (second Tuesday of each month)
